author: @lanacionpy
title: Basa cierra un a√±o de logros sin precedentes
text:
El 2024 ha sido un a√±o de resultados hist√≥ricos para Banco Basa, marcando un hito en su trayectoria y consolid√°ndose como uno de los actores m√°s destacados en el sistema financiero nacional. A trav√©s de una estrategia s√≥lida y enfocada en las personas, Basa ha logrado cifras extraordinarias que refuerzan su posici√≥n como uno de los bancos de referencia en Paraguay.
Uno de los hitos m√°s importantes fue el crecimiento en la cartera de pr√©stamos de consumo, donde Basa lider√≥ el mercado con un aumento del 72,1%, muy por encima del promedio del sistema financiero, que alcanz√≥ un 20% en los √∫ltimos meses del a√±o. Este resultado refleja la confianza de los clientes en el banco, as√≠ como su capacidad para ofrecer soluciones financieras alineadas con sus expectativas.
En t√©rminos generales, Basa tambi√©n se posicion√≥ como el tercer banco con mayor crecimiento en cartera de pr√©stamos entre sus pares, destac√°ndose por su habilidad para expandir su oferta crediticia y atender las demandas de diferentes sectores de la econom√≠a. En dep√≥sitos, Basa ocup√≥ el segundo lugar en crecimiento, demostrando su solidez y la preferencia de los ahorristas por confiar en la instituci√≥n.
[Te puede interesar: Disponen reglamentaci√≥n del SIAP y establecen fechas de identificaci√≥n desde febrero](https://www.lanacion.com.py/negocios/2024/12/26/disponen-reglamentacion-del-siap-y-establecen-fechas-de-identificacion-desde-febrero/)
Un logro particularmente significativo fue la reducci√≥n de la mora, un desaf√≠o clave para la industria financiera. Basa fue el banco que m√°s redujo su √≠ndice de morosidad en el mercado, un indicador del manejo eficiente de riesgos y de la calidad de su cartera de clientes.
Estos resultados son el reflejo de una gesti√≥n eficiente que responde a una estrategia alineada a la consolidaci√≥n de la entidad como un banco universal. Asimismo, evidencia el compromiso por parte del equipo humano de Basa en cuidar y acompa√±ar a sus clientes. Con estos logros, Banco Basa cierra el a√±o con la mirada puesta en un futuro de s√≥lido crecimiento y en seguir liderando con excelencia en el mercado financiero paraguayo.
[Lea tambi√©n: El 2024 fue un a√±o r√©cord en faenas para frigor√≠ficos, pero negativo para productores](https://www.lanacion.com.py/negocios/2024/12/26/el-2024-fue-un-ano-record-en-faenas-para-frigorificos-pero-negativo-para-productores/)

Ive Not Had Sex For Years Now But People Dont Believe Me- Actress Evan Okoro Claims
Published by
Gistlover
on Fri, 31 Jan 2025
Nollywood actress and filmmaker Evan Okoro has shared that she has been celibate for several years, even though many people doubt her claim. In a recent Instagram post, she mentioned that many find it hard to believe her story of staying abstinent. According to Okoro, she chooses not to participate in sexual activity because of []The post Ive Not Had Sex For Years Now But People Dont Believe Me- Actress Evan Okoro Claims appeared first on Gistlover.

author: Patrizio Caro
title: VIDEO: Violento robo sufre el equipo australiano de BMX previo a Par√≠s 2024
text:
VIDEO: Violento robo sufre el equipo australiano de BMX previo a Par√≠s 2024
La estrella australiana de BMX, Logan Martin, le roban equipo en su furgoneta justo antes de los Juegos Ol√≠mpicos.
BRUSELAS, B√©lgica.- Un incidente desafortunado ha empa√±ado la preparaci√≥n del equipo australiano de BMX para los Juegos Ol√≠mpicos de Par√≠s 2024. Logan Martin, medallista de oro en Tokio 2020 y figura destacada de la delegaci√≥n australiana, denunci√≥ a trav√©s de sus redes sociales el robo de varias de sus pertenencias.
Te podr√≠a interesar:
Par√≠s 2024: Atleta australiano se amputa dedo para participar en los Juegos Ol√≠mpicos
El joven de 30 a√±os de Queensland comparti√≥ una serie de videos y publicaciones desde una calle de Bruselas en sus redes sociales mostrando a la polic√≠a local investigando, con la ventana de una furgoneta negra destrozada.
Nuestra furgoneta fue asaltada anoche, por suerte mis bicicletas no estaban all√≠, aunque mis bolsas de bicicleta s√≠ estaban, con algunas cosas dentro‚Äù, expres√≥ Martin en un video publicado en sus redes sociales. Las im√°genes muestran los da√±os causados al veh√≠culo y la consternaci√≥n del equipo ante lo sucedido.
Es un comienzo loco para el viaje.‚Äù
üá´üá∑ Resumen d√≠a 1 Juegos Ol√≠mpicos de Par√≠s.‚Äî Alt Right Espa√±a (@ModoAlt)
- Robos a deportistas de diferentes nacionalidades de carteras, relojes y anillos mientras entrenaban.
- Suspensi√≥n del partido de f√∫tbol entre Argentina y Marruecos por asalto del campo de marronies.
- Destrozo y robo de uno de los‚Ä¶
[pic.twitter.com/Ppl26QFwv1] [July 24, 2024]
En un segundo video, Martin dijo que se recuper√≥ parte del equipo detr√°s de un parque, incluyendo guantes, un casco, herramientas y una mesa de masajes. Los ladrones devoraron su reserva de barras de chocolate, dejando los envoltorios junto al equipo descartado.
Por suerte, la mayor√≠a de nuestras cosas estaban en nuestra habitaci√≥n y tambi√©n logramos recuperar gran parte de ellas. Perd√≠ mi billetera, mochila y algunas otras cosas, pero en general no result√≥ tan malo. Es desafortunado cuando las personas sienten la necesidad de hacer cosas como esta.‚Äù
A pesar de este contratiempo, el equipo australiano de BMX se muestra determinado a superar este obst√°culo y a representar a su pa√≠s de la mejor manera en los Juegos Ol√≠mpicos. Las competencias de BMX est√°n programadas para iniciar el pr√≥ximo 30 de julio.
Te recomendamos

author: Mark Mann-Bryans
title: Arsenal show why Premier League title may slip away ‚Äì and it‚Äôs not down to VAR | The Independent
text: Arsenal missed the chance to return to the top of the Premier League as they slipped to a disappointing defeat against West Ham amid more VAR controversy.The Gunners needed victory to replace Liverpool at the summit but lost 2-0 to the Hammers on a night where David Moyes finally landed a victory at the Emirates Stadium.His West Ham side lost Kurt Zouma ahead of the game and Lucas Paqueta after just over half an hour but hit the front through Tomas Soucek ‚Äôs strike, awarded after VAR could not determine whether the whole ball had gone out of play in the build-up.A second-half header from former Arsenal defender Konstantinos Mavropanos secured the points and things could have been even better for the visitors had Said Benrahma not seen a last-gasp penalty saved by David Raya.Moyes had failed to secure victory in his previous 72 Premier League away games at Arsenal, Chelsea, Liverpool or Manchester United, so this was a long time coming for the Scot.Putting the VAR drama to one side, Arsenal laboured when they needed to continue their recent winning run in London derbies to go back to the top of the table. Instead, only captain Martin Odegaard could hold his head high on a night where their defence creaked and Gabriel Jesus was guilty of missing a couple of very good chances.Arsenal suffered a damaging defeat Arsenal started well, with some great touches in and around the West Ham box from Odegaard in particular.But at the other end their defending left a lot to be desired, as Oleksandr Zinchenko and Gabriel Magalhaes failed to deal with a simple ball into the middle.Jarrod Bowen capitalised by latching onto the miscue and teed up Soucek to finish ‚Äì the goal surviving a lengthy VAR check which could not ultimately make a call on if the ball had not gone out of play before Bowen‚Äôs cutback.Arsenal looked to respond although the goal gave West Ham something to defend, although Jesus found a way in behind with a subtle flick into Bukayo Saka, whose header was brilliantly saved by Alphonse Areola.Paqueta had been hurt in the warm-up and lasted just over half an hour, with his fellow Brazilian Gabriel Martinelli curling an effort just wide for Arsenal as they continued in vain to find a leveller.The hosts were getting closer, West Ham gifting possession as two passes saw Arsenal in on goal once more, this time Saka hitting the base of the post from an acute angle.West Ham celebrated an impressive win Former West Ham captain Declan Rice fired just over from 25 yards but it was another player coming back to haunt his former club who would find the back of the net soon after.Mavropanos made just seven league starts in three years as an Arsenal player but returned to the Premier League last summer with the Hammers and headed them two goals ahead before the hour.Jesus then headed straight at Areola before sending another fine chance well over the bar moments after Arteta introduced Eddie Nketiah and Reiss Nelson off the bench.Areola was on hand again to keep out a Leandro Trossard effort, with Vladimir Coufal clearing a William Saliba header off the line from the resulting corner.Rice had come off the bench during a 3-0 Carabao Cup defeat on his return to West Ham earlier in the season and endured another night to forget here as he conceded a late penalty for tripping Emerson Palmieri in the box ‚Äì only for Raya to keep out substitute Benrahma‚Äôs tame spot-kick.Arsenal suffered a damaging defeat West Ham celebrated an impressive win Gabriel Jesus missed a number of good chances for Arsenal Want to bookmark your favourite articles and stories to read or reference later? Start your Independent Premium subscription today.

author: J√∫lia Regu√©
title: L'automobil√≠stica xinesa Chery obrir√† a la tardor un centre d'R+D a Cornell√†
text:
L‚Äôautomobil√≠stica xinesa Chery obrir√† a la tardor un centre d‚ÄôR+D a Cornell√†
Illa firma un acord amb el president del grup amb qu√® dona suport al desenvolupament de la marca a Catalunya / El president ofereix Barcelona per acollir la seu central de la companyia a Europa
Nova inversi√≥ de l‚Äôautomobil√≠stica Chery a Catalunya. El president Salvador Illa va anunciar que la multinacional xinesa obrir√† un centre a Cornell√† de Llobregat dedicat a la recerca i el desenvolupament (R+D). Les oficines, que tindran una superf√≠cie de 2.000 metres quadrats, estaran operatives a partir d‚Äôaquesta tardor.
Despr√©s de reunir-se a la seu central de Wuhu amb el president del grup, Yin Tongyue, en el marc del seu viatge oficial al gegant asi√†tic, Illa va concretar que des de les noves instal¬∑lacions es donar√† suport a escala global per al disseny i l‚Äôadaptaci√≥ dels seus vehicles als est√†ndards de qualitat del mercat europeu. No obstant, encara no s‚Äôha assenyalat la quantitat de la inversi√≥ ni els llocs de treball que implicar√†.
Durant la trobada, Illa i Yin van firmar un comprom√≠s que els empla√ßa a continuar col¬∑laborant i pel qual la Generalitat donar√† suport al desenvolupament industrial i d‚Äôinnovaci√≥ tecnol√≤gica de la marca a Catalunya amb incentius regulatoris i tamb√© li proporcionar√† una xarxa d‚Äôassist√®ncia per estar en contacte amb universitats i centres de recerca a fi de captar talent local. Per la seva banda, l‚Äôempresa promet reafirmar la seva aposta de desenvolupament a llarg termini en territori catal√† i, en aquest marc, el president va presentar Barcelona com un lloc adequat per instal¬∑lar la seva seu central a Europa.
"Relaci√≥ bidireccional"
"√âs una relaci√≥ bidireccional, com han de ser les relacions equilibrades i justes. Tothom ha de guanyar [...] Busquem relacions s√≤lides, no volem arrencades de cavall i parades de burro", va afirmar Illa, i va reblar que aquest nou acord permet continuar situant Catalunya en l‚Äôavantguarda de l‚Äôautomoci√≥ a Espanya.
Chery, un dels principals fabricants automobil√≠stics de la Xina, ja va firmar l‚Äôabril del 2024 un acord amb l‚Äôempresa EV Motors ‚Äìpropiet√†ria d‚ÄôEbro i BTech‚Äì de cara a produir cotxes a l‚Äôantiga planta de Nissan a la Zona Franca. La companyia opera a m√©s de 80 mercats d‚Äôarreu del m√≥n i es mant√© com la marca xinesa que m√©s ven en els mercats internacionals des de fa 22 anys.
Des del Govern celebren el nou pacte perqu√® enforteix els vincles amb una multinacional xinesa i perqu√® est√† relacionat amb un sector estrat√®gic, en el qual Illa ha posat l‚Äôull per tal d‚Äôexemplificar la seva aposta per una mobilitat sostenible. De fet, des del seu gabinet defensen que aquesta alian√ßa est√† en plena sintonia amb el desplegament del pla d‚Äôimpuls al vehicle el√®ctric, presentat pel Govern aquest febrer.
Per√≤ √©s tamb√© una conjunci√≥ clau per continuar estrenyent lla√ßos amb altres empreses i exhibir la seva voluntat de refor√ßar la seva pres√®ncia al continent. Actualment, hi ha m√©s de 200 empreses xineses que tenen filials a Catalunya amb unes inversions per valor de 1.279 milions en els √∫ltims cinc anys, cosa que suposa un 300% m√©s respecte al mateix per√≠ode anterior. Aquesta circumst√†ncia situa la Xina com el cinqu√® pa√≠s del m√≥n que m√©s inverteix a Catalunya i el primer a escala asi√†tica, cosa que genera m√©s de 2.300 nous llocs de treball, especialment en projectes d‚Äôautomoci√≥, audiovisuals i tecnol√≤gics.
El tif√≥ impacta en el viatge
Illa tamb√© va visitar ahir la seu de SEAT i Cupra a la ciutat de Hefei i va tancar la jornada amb una visita a AMES Group, una companyia catalana amb seu a Sant Feliu de Llobregat que est√† especialitzada tamb√© en el sector de l‚Äôautomoci√≥, concretament en la producci√≥ de peces estructurals sinteritzades. La marca preveu crear m√©s de 200 llocs de treball en els pr√≤xims cinc anys, i ampliar aix√≠ el centenar d‚Äôempleats que t√© ara.
La previsi√≥ era marxar despr√©s cap a Shanghai, per√≤ l‚Äôalerta a causa del tif√≥ va provocar la cancel¬∑laci√≥ de trens i el tancament de les carreteres. Aix√≠ que Illa va passar la nit a Wuhu, i recorrer√† avui els 350 quil√≤metres de dist√†ncia, complint les restriccions de les autoritats xineses. Si res es tor√ßa, Illa arribar√† amb tren a Shanghai a les 09.12 hores.
Not√≠cies relacionadesLa visita prevista inicialment al port es reduir√† a una reuni√≥ amb les autoritats portu√†ries a les oficines, en qu√® tamb√© participar√† el president del Port de Barcelona, Jos√© Alberto Carbonell.
Shanghai √©s l‚Äô√∫ltima parada del seu viatge oficial, i all√† es quedar√† fins dem√†. En aquesta metr√≤polis t√© hora amb l‚Äôaerol√≠nia China Eastern, el fabricant de materials per a bateries ICL-Dynanonics i la firma catalana, instal¬∑lada al pa√≠s, Ficosa. Tamb√© oferir√† una confer√®ncia econ√≤mica davant empresaris xinesos i far√† el balan√ß del seu primer any de mandat.

author: CNN
title: ‚ÄòA huge shock to the system‚Äô: Doctors warn about asthma inhaler switch coming in January | News | WPSD Local 6
text: (CNN) ‚Äî Starting January 1, a drug that thousands of patients depend on to help them breathe will disappear from pharmacy shelves, and doctors are concerned patients may have delays switching to alternatives and getting them covered by insurance. Manufacturer GSK has said it‚Äôs discontinuing the branded asthma inhaler Flovent, and instead is making an ‚Äúauthorized generic‚Äù version, which is identical but without the same branding. Physicians who treat patients with asthma say the authorized generic will work just as well as the branded drug, but it doesn‚Äôt appear to be covered as widely by insurers. That may mean patients will have to obtain new prescriptions and sort out coverage hurdles at the height of respiratory virus season. ‚ÄúThis medication has been the most commonly used inhaled medication for the past 25 or 30 years,‚Äù said Dr. Robyn Cohen, a pediatric pulmonologist at Boston Medical Center. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the one that, overwhelmingly, pediatricians reach for when they decide that their patient needs a daily preventive medication. ‚Ä¶ The fact that it‚Äôs being discontinued is going to be a huge shock to the system for patients, for families and for doctors.‚Äù Doctors are urging patients to take action now to ensure they‚Äôve got their medicine heading into the new year and advocacy groups have been trying to get the word out. But the story of why Flovent is disappearing, and the lack of insurance coverage for its ostensibly identical replacement, touches on some of the most complex facets of American health care and drug pricing. Major change to Medicaid‚Äôs drug program A spokeswoman for GSK said the company is making the change ‚Äúas part of our commitment to be ambitious for patients.‚Äù She noted the company introduced the authorized generics of Flovent HFA, an inhalation aerosol, and Flovent Diskus, an inhalation powder, in May 2022 and October 2023, and that, subsequently, it would discontinue manufacturing the branded versions in the United States on January 1, 2024. The authorized generics, she said, ‚Äúwill provide patients in the US with potentially lower cost alternatives of these medically important products.‚Äù Experts who follow the industry both on Wall Street and in academia, though, point out GSK is making the switch at precisely the time a change in Medicaid rebates could cause the company to have to pay large penalties because of price increases on Flovent over a number of years. The legal change coming into effect on the first of the year removes a cap on Medicaid rebates that companies are required to pay if they raise the price of medicines more than inflation. ‚ÄúFlovent Diskus has been on the market since 2000 and Flovent HFA since 2004, and GSK has hiked the price on both products numerous times since their launch,‚Äù Dr. William Feldman, an associate physician in the Division of Pulmonary and Critical Care Medicine at Brigham and Women‚Äôs Hospital who studies asthma drugs, told CNN. ‚ÄúThese are precisely the sort of drugs that will be affected by the new policy eliminating the Medicaid rebate cap.‚Äù Until now, the rebates were capped at the total price of a drug, so manufacturers would never pay more than a drug costs back to Medicaid. But under a provision in the 2021 American Rescue Plan Act, that limit was removed, and starting January 1, 2024, drugs that have been subject to large price increases over time could end up incurring rebates to Medicaid that are greater than their price ‚Äî meaning pharmaceutical companies would sell those drugs to Medicaid at a loss. ‚ÄúObviously pharma doesn‚Äôt want to be selling at a loss on anything in its portfolio,‚Äù said Andrew Baum, an analyst who covers the stock of GSK and other pharmaceutical companies for the financial firm Citi. ‚ÄúSo it seeks to evade impact by, one: discontinuation; two: authorized generic.‚Äù An authorized generic, Baum told CNN, is viewed as a separate product, ‚Äúbut still enables pharma to collect some of the economics.‚Äù Or, put another way, it‚Äôs the same product without the branding and also without the history of price increases that would leave the medicine vulnerable to such large rebates to Medicaid. According to data from GoodRx, the price of branded Flovent has gone up about 47% since 2014. Other drugmakers have made changes ahead of the January 1 rebate cap removal as well; makers of insulin this year announced major price cuts ‚Äî of 70% or more ‚Äî on their products, a move analysts estimate will save them hundreds of millions of dollars a year. The authorized generic strategy GSK is employing ‚Äúis a way, broadly speaking, to maximize the profitability of the product in question,‚Äù said David Amsellem, a financial analyst who covers the industry at investment firm Piper Sandler. He noted there are currently no other generic versions of Flovent approved by the FDA. GSK did price the authorized generic lower than branded Flovent; one package of Flovent HFA in the 110 microgram dose, for example, costs $273.83, about 50% more than the $177.99 wholesale acquisition cost of its authorized generic counterpart, according to prices the company shared with CNN. The wholesale acquisition cost is the price before insurance and rebates. But CVS Caremark, a major pharmacy benefit manager that determines which medicines are covered by insurance for its members, is giving preferential placement to another branded inhaler, Pulmicort, on its formulary, instead of the authorized generic versions of Flovent. ‚ÄúIn this case, the authorized generics were more expensive than the brand name medications,‚Äù a CVS spokesman told CNN. He noted that‚Äôs based on net prices, rather than the wholesale acquisition cost, meaning Pulmicort could be less expensive because of rebates its manufacturer, AstraZeneca, pays to obtain better insurance coverage. ‚ÄòThe worst possible time of year‚Äô The fact that insurance plans aren‚Äôt broadly covering the authorized generic of Flovent, said BMC‚Äôs Cohen, ‚Äúmeans that patients are going to need to get a brand new prescription for a completely different medication in the middle of the worst possible time of year, which is the winter respiratory virus season.‚Äù For patients with persistent asthma, Cohen said, Flovent has been the most commonly used daily preventive anti-inflammatory medication for decades. It shrinks swelling in the airways and reduces the body‚Äôs exaggerated response to triggers that make it hard to breathe. During cold and flu season, she said, it becomes even more crucial to have that daily medicine. ‚ÄúFlu, Covid, RSV ‚Äî all these circulating viruses that are going around right now ‚Äî are one of the biggest, if not the biggest, triggers for asthma attacks in kids,‚Äù Cohen said. ‚ÄúThis is what leads to kids being in the emergency room.‚Äù Cohen said she‚Äôs concerned that patients, as well as physicians and pharmacists, don‚Äôt know this change with Flovent is coming, and they need to act now to work out alternatives and determine insurance coverage. For some groups, the alternatives are more limited. For patients with a more rare inflammatory condition, called eosinophilic esophagitis, Flovent HFA is one of the most commonly prescribed topical steroids, and other medicines don‚Äôt have as much data supporting their use in the condition, said Dr. Erin Syverson, an attending physician in the Division of Gastroenterology, Hepatology and Nutrition at Boston Children‚Äôs Hospital. As EoE affects the esophagus, patients swallow the medicine instead of breathing it in, and it can tame the inflammation that can cause pain with swallowing or food getting stuck, requiring procedures to remove it. In kids, Syverson said, EoE can lead to recurrent vomiting, heartburn, belly aches, and trouble making progress starting solid foods, and Flovent can help keep the condition under control. ‚ÄúWith the discontinuation coming up, I worry it‚Äôs going to just be one more hurdle for this patient population that already has very limited medications available to them,‚Äù Syverson told CNN. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know what January is going to be like, but I‚Äôm worried.‚Äù
